name: Tiny Empires
description:
Click the blue expand button to go into full screen.

You should probably write down what the tiles give...

CONTROLS
Move the mouse and click.
Use arrow keys to move the camera

Tiny Empires is my Compo entry for Ludum Dare 40. The theme of this Ludum Dare is "The more you have, the worse it is."

Please visit my Ludum Dare page to vote on my game!
